td.content: s:62 yo white M printer with C/O severe clouded, blurred vision in right eye for 5 weeks that is frequent. patient also reports severe seeing halos around light, severe blurry and double vision. he does not smoke he drinks 2 beers per night o:Height 74 in, Weight 187 lbs, Temperature 98.3 F, Pulse 89, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16 a:Cataracts p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.

content2.Unmatched: patient also reports severe seeing halos around light , severe blurry

td.content: s:patient presents with severe blurry and double vision, severe clouded, blurred vision in right eye, severe seeing halos around light and Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat for past 10 days. he is a white male aged 62 years. he denies ever using cigarettes drinks daily o:Height 73 in, Weight 181 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 88, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 14 a:Cataracts p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Extracapsular cataract extraction (ECCE) - eye.

td.content: s:a white m printer aged 63 Ys c/o 5 days h/o severe seeing halos around light. NKDA. denies any smoking drinks daily o:Height 75 in, Weight 190 lbs, Temperature 98.5 F, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 18, non-dilated fundus examination opacities seen in red reflex a:Cataracts p:performed non-dilated fundus examination, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
